definition[0]: if a company is at the front end of a business or activity, they have a lot of success, especially because they are producing a lot of new products
example[0]: He is experienced at dealing companies at the front end of the retail financial services sector.
definition[1]: charges or costs you have to pay before you can receive something or before an investment can start making you money
example[1]: Initial charges are 4% for the managed funds and there is no front end charge for the single funds.
